name: Focal Systems
headline: Building the Operating System for B&M Retail using Deep Learning
description: Focal Systems is on a mission to lower the cost of living for all mankind by automating and optimizing Brick and Mortar Retail with the latest advancements in AI. Focal Systems is the industry leader in retail automation solutions. By digitizing store shelves hourly and unleashing FocalOS, retailers unlock huge operational efficiencies, optimized merchandising, and streamlined supply chains which deliver impactful financial results. Focal is transforming retail by empowering store management to make automated, data-driven decisions. We are the operating system of retail.

founders.name: Michael Cantalino, Founder/COO
founders.description: Founder at Focal Systems, the AI operating system of brick-and-mortar retail. Leading with a people-first mentality. Constantly aiming to leave the world better than I found it in all aspects of business and life. Alongside technology, heavily involved in the non-profit sector and all things outdoors.

### [See What You’ve Never Seen Before at EuroCIS 2025: Real-Time Shelf Intelligence](http://www.focal.systems/</eurocis2025>)
## Upgrade to a **Self-Driving Store** with
Powered by the most advanced and proven AI in retail, FocalOS automates and optimizes every human-made decision your team makes today, including order-writing, labor schedules, inventory updates, per store planograms, and much more. This drives remarkable operational efficiencies that can double your EBITDA in the first month. 
## **200K+**
Cameras Deployed
## **88%**
Average EBITDA Lift
## **9.2**
Average Stocker NPS
## **1,000+**
Stores Deployed
## **84%**
Food Waste Reduction
## **36.7k**
Pounds of Food Saved Annually
![Piggly Wiggly American supermarket chain logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/99fb5982-1a47-45b1-8324-7327492a9494/Piggly-Wiggly-logo.png)
![fairway market grocery chain logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/21f8a0cc-09db-46ee-8ef5-eddc8dad8e30/fairway-logo.png)
![Metropolitan Market Retail Groceries logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/e2b17401-5973-43da-98e8-de05e3d3a5f5/metropolitanmarket-logo.png)
![Logotype of the Wm Morrison Supermarkets Limited, trading as Morrisons, is one of the largest supermarket chain in the United Kingdom](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/50648555-0a05-4549-96fc-1506409ea196/morrisons.png)
![ShopRite American retailer cooperative of supermarkets logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/8c694f2b-3f54-456f-ac0a-929dca449029/ShopRite-Logo.png)
![village supermarket stores logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/b5ab48bd-04a2-442b-9a55-4027e043f3d5/super-village-logo.png)
![C&S Wholesale Grocers wholesale grocery supply company logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/5433af7f-6c18-498d-8678-d8a5b083c6c7/WSG.png)
![Co-opportunity Market food grocer logo](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/98ebc550-aa40-4afe-aead-70287c9ee6d3/coop-logo.png)
### **How****Focal****works?**
Focal takes the power of self-driving cars and unleashes it in retail to automate and optimize your stores.
## **01**
**Tiny, ruggedized Shelf Cameras digitize your sales-floor, backroom, and top-stock hourly**
![Shelf camera for digitizing store inventory items](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/5a6f469b-df90-498b-bb31-5fdcaf6bcc83/Screen+Shot+2023-05-07+at+2.18.50+PM.png)
Focal has developed a ruggedized, cost effective, battery-powered, wifi-camera that scans your shelves hourly, allowing you to know exactly what is on your shelf all throughout the day.
Focal installs your entire store in one night, and the next day they are powering your store. Focal then manages the cameras for you, so you never have to touch a thing. We guarantee >99% uptime.
## **02**
**Focal’s AI accurately detects ins, outs, lows, missing price tags, spoiled produce, and more**
![Hourly history of changes in stock on shelves](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/1682079487005-53SYAXPG4SFSFEII1RP2/ezgif.com-gif-maker.gif)
Trained on over **2.5 billion** **labeled images** from global retailers around the world, Focal has the most accurate Computer Vision on the market. These models remove PII, then accurately monitor store inventory, restock events, and spoiled produce every hour. This data powers other applications and can generate picklists in Action Tool or instant orders. It also tracks associate productivity per hour.
## **03**
**FocalOS runs your store for you with higher employee satisfaction and EBITDA**
![Diagram of FocalOS highlighting key features: Adaptive Ordering, Prioritized Replenishment, Planograms, E-comm Integration, and Automated Management](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/1dcd2601-f082-4a34-9d5e-3a6fa1d0cff1/Self_driving_store.png)
FocalOS takes in hourly shelf digitization data and your sales data, then automatically produces optimal orders, labor schedules, task lists for associates, and per store planograms. FocalOS also measures productivity and compliance for each associate, and tells you where to focus your attention. Finally, Focal Store Walk allows management to teleport in at any time and visually see what your customers see when they go to your store.
## Works right out of the box, no integration needed.
  * ![Illustration of a delivery truck, indicating FocalOS's automated precision ordering using in-store camera observations.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/c8bbbb4d-da0f-4501-91fc-9d49f84bad6c/ordering.png)
## Precision Ordering
FocalOS automates Ordering based on what the cameras see on the sales-floor and backroom
[Learn more](http://www.focal.systems/</supply-chain>)
  * ![Graphic showing a store layout and mobile app interface representing FocalOS's automated stock replenishment system.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/77b9f68c-1bb5-4a38-835e-f0e63a60ab26/Action+tool.png)
## Prioritized Replenishment
FocalOS automates and optimizes Stocker management with real-time, prioritized tasks
[Learn more](http://www.focal.systems/</stocker-action-tool>)
  * ![Isometric illustration of a digital planogram display and store shelves, symbolizing automated adaptive planograms](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/03981c15-0791-4aff-a61e-b71c5a128848/AdaPOG.png)
## Adaptive Planograms
FocalOS automates and optimizes Category Management by adapting Shelf Allocations per store to changes in supply or demand
[Learn more](http://www.focal.systems/</adapog>)
  * ![Digital tablet interface showcasing an e-commerce platform, representing FocalOS's automation in online retail management](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/b8ba27ba-feef-487b-baa1-1769eb3a3243/Ecomm.png)
## Adaptive E-comm
FocalOS automates E-Comm platform management and eliminates substitutions
[Learn more](http://www.focal.systems/</technology>)
  * ![A tablet with Focal Impact: Virtual store tours with live shelf images, hourly stock updates, lost sales insights, productivity tracking, and competitive restocking.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/4fb87a13-27a0-482c-8dfb-4da2a20ab20b/Teleport.png)
## Automated Management
FocalOS automates and optimizes stocker management
[Learn more](http://www.focal.systems/</operations>)


### Our mission is to lower the cost of living for all mankind by deploying AI so powerful, it allows all retailers to lower their prices for their customers. 
We do this by building solutions that double stocker productivity, cut food waste in half and optimize the use of every square inch of shelf space in your store.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/d1522a47-4e68-47e2-9203-3f0f5beb6459/X5-bg.png)
#### 2X to 10X Faster Stocking
Most Retailers work backroom inventory by bringing everything from the backroom to the salesfloor to see if it can fit. With Focal Action Tool, we allow stockers to “teleport” to the salesfloor to see if it can fit before taking it out, saving them half or more of their time.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/e4ac53cf-a68c-47b1-b8e9-6eefc2636713/Shrink-bg.png)
#### Reduce Food Waste by 84%
Produce Managers typically order 1 to 2X PAR everyday. However, this does not “adjust” for on-shelf availability or shrink. With Focal’s AI-powered AdaOrder, we automate this order producing orders that are far more accurate, and reduce food waste while increasing sales.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/b2e6e42b-14d6-40ff-b29a-9c5cc4ae158d/food+waste-bg.png)
#### Reduced Operating Costs
FocalOS automates ordering and doubles stocker productivity. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/9ae2fd98-e98b-4dad-997c-2b340bb2e56f/carbon-bg.png)
#### Reduce Retail’s Carbon Footprint
Since Retail accounts for over a third of all food waste in the world, Retail also accounts for a significant percentage of GHG (Greenhouse Gas) Emissions. AdaOrder allows retailers to cut 84% of this food waste, and thereby 84% of their GHG Emissions.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/655fdf6b-5066-4785-8d6d-96c46709f291/Screen+Shot+2023-05-15+at+9.42.48+AM.png)
#### Happier Employees
Stockers are tired of using technology and SOPs that are older than them. Our UI/UX team built FocalOS with the stockers in mind. Stockers love our system. It is easy to learn, and fun to use. And most importantly, it gives credit to the A-players that deserve it!
[ Get Started Today ](http://www.focal.systems/<>)

### See What You’ve Never Seen Before at EuroCIS 2025: Real-Time Shelf Intelligence⟨29⟩
## Upgrade to a **Self-Driving Store** with
Powered by the most advanced and proven AI in retail, FocalOS automates and optimizes every human-made decision your team makes today, including order-writing, labor schedules, inventory updates, per store planograms, and much more. This drives remarkable operational efficiencies that can double your EBITDA in the first month. 
## **200K+**
Cameras Deployed
## **88%**
Average EBITDA Lift
## **9.2**
Average Stocker NPS
## **1,000+**
Stores Deployed
## **84%**
Food Waste Reduction
## **36.7k**
Pounds of Food Saved Annually
![Piggly Wiggly American supermarket chain logo⟨30⟩]
![fairway market grocery chain logo⟨31⟩]
![Metropolitan Market Retail Groceries logo⟨32⟩]
![Logotype of the Wm Morrison Supermarkets Limited, trading as Morrisons, is one of the largest supermarket chain in the United Kingdom⟨33⟩]
![ShopRite American retailer cooperative of supermarkets logo⟨34⟩]
![village supermarket stores logo⟨35⟩]
![C&S Wholesale Grocers wholesale grocery supply company logo⟨36⟩]
![Co-opportunity Market food grocer logo⟨37⟩]
### **How****Focal****works?**
Focal takes the power of self-driving cars and unleashes it in retail to automate and optimize your stores.
## **01**
**Tiny, ruggedized Shelf Cameras digitize your sales-floor, backroom, and top-stock hourly**
![Shelf camera for digitizing store inventory items⟨38⟩]
Focal has developed a ruggedized, cost effective, battery-powered, wifi-camera that scans your shelves hourly, allowing you to know exactly what is on your shelf all throughout the day.
Focal installs your entire store in one night, and the next day they are powering your store. Focal then manages the cameras for you, so you never have to touch a thing. We guarantee >99% uptime.
## **02**
**Focal’s AI accurately detects ins, outs, lows, missing price tags, spoiled produce, and more**
![Hourly history of changes in stock on shelves⟨39⟩]
Trained on over **2.5 billion** **labeled images** from global retailers around the world, Focal has the most accurate Computer Vision on the market. These models remove PII, then accurately monitor store inventory, restock events, and spoiled produce every hour. This data powers other applications and can generate picklists in Action Tool or instant orders. It also tracks associate productivity per hour.
## **03**
**FocalOS runs your store for you with higher employee satisfaction and EBITDA**
![Diagram of FocalOS highlighting key features: Adaptive Ordering, Prioritized Replenishment, Planograms, E-comm Integration, and Automated Management⟨40⟩]
FocalOS takes in hourly shelf digitization data and your sales data, then automatically produces optimal orders, labor schedules, task lists for associates, and per store planograms. FocalOS also measures productivity and compliance for each associate, and tells you where to focus your attention. Finally, Focal Store Walk allows management to teleport in at any time and visually see what your customers see when they go to your store.
## Works right out of the box, no integration needed.
  * ![Illustration of a delivery truck, indicating FocalOS's automated precision ordering using in-store camera observations.⟨41⟩]
## Precision Ordering
FocalOS automates Ordering based on what the cameras see on the sales-floor and backroom
Learn more⟨11⟩
  * ![Graphic showing a store layout and mobile app interface representing FocalOS's automated stock replenishment system.⟨42⟩]
## Prioritized Replenishment
FocalOS automates and optimizes Stocker management with real-time, prioritized tasks
Learn more⟨18⟩
  * ![Isometric illustration of a digital planogram display and store shelves, symbolizing automated adaptive planograms⟨43⟩]
## Adaptive Planograms
FocalOS automates and optimizes Category Management by adapting Shelf Allocations per store to changes in supply or demand
Learn more⟨15⟩
  * ![Digital tablet interface showcasing an e-commerce platform, representing FocalOS's automation in online retail management⟨44⟩]
## Adaptive E-comm
FocalOS automates E-Comm platform management and eliminates substitutions
Learn more⟨12⟩
  * ![A tablet with Focal Impact: Virtual store tours with live shelf images, hourly stock updates, lost sales insights, productivity tracking, and competitive restocking.⟨45⟩]
## Automated Management
FocalOS automates and optimizes stocker management
Learn more⟨9⟩


### Our mission is to lower the cost of living for all mankind by deploying AI so powerful, it allows all retailers to lower their prices for their customers. 
We do this by building solutions that double stocker productivity, cut food waste in half and optimize the use of every square inch of shelf space in your store.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/d1522a47-4e68-47e2-9203-3f0f5beb6459/X5-bg.png)
#### 2X to 10X Faster Stocking
Most Retailers work backroom inventory by bringing everything from the backroom to the salesfloor to see if it can fit. With Focal Action Tool, we allow stockers to “teleport” to the salesfloor to see if it can fit before taking it out, saving them half or more of their time.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/e4ac53cf-a68c-47b1-b8e9-6eefc2636713/Shrink-bg.png)
#### Reduce Food Waste by 84%
Produce Managers typically order 1 to 2X PAR everyday. However, this does not “adjust” for on-shelf availability or shrink. With Focal’s AI-powered AdaOrder, we automate this order producing orders that are far more accurate, and reduce food waste while increasing sales.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/b2e6e42b-14d6-40ff-b29a-9c5cc4ae158d/food+waste-bg.png)
#### Reduced Operating Costs
FocalOS automates ordering and doubles stocker productivity. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/9ae2fd98-e98b-4dad-997c-2b340bb2e56f/carbon-bg.png)
#### Reduce Retail’s Carbon Footprint
Since Retail accounts for over a third of all food waste in the world, Retail also accounts for a significant percentage of GHG (Greenhouse Gas) Emissions. AdaOrder allows retailers to cut 84% of this food waste, and thereby 84% of their GHG Emissions.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/655fdf6b-5066-4785-8d6d-96c46709f291/Screen+Shot+2023-05-15+at+9.42.48+AM.png)
#### Happier Employees
Stockers are tired of using technology and SOPs that are older than them. Our UI/UX team built FocalOS with the stockers in mind. Stockers love our system. It is easy to learn, and fun to use. And most importantly, it gives credit to the A-players that deserve it!
 Get Started Today ⟨46⟩
### **What our****partners****are saying about us**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_“Focal is helping us use technology to improve our on-shelf customer availability, so our customers can find what they are looking for, each time they choose to shop in-store with us.”_
**Sam Wankowski, COO, Walmart Canada**
![Walmart Inc. an American multinational retail corporation color logo⟨47⟩]
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_“We chose Focal Systems as they have proven they can reliably unlock productivity gains in our stores with their Al, while improving the customer experience and sales”_
**Nico Sumas, co-president of Village Super Market**
![village supermarket stores color logo⟨48⟩]
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_"Piggly Wiggly has been changing the industry since it launched its first store. Our partnership with Focal Systems will enable us to provide an even better shopper experience by leveraging the most innovative retail automation technology available"_
**Mark McGowan, SVP Retail, C &S Wholesale**
![Piggly Wiggly American supermarket chain color logo⟨49⟩]
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_“As part of the team who designed and built this solution, I can safely say it is delivering improvements to availability, colleague productivity and greater stock accuracy in our supply chain systems.”_
**Nick Hook, Enterprise Architect**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/ecc2bf4d-2369-44b5-83b3-65a7005b5e09/morisons+logo.png)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_“I have loved working with this system in Balby for the last 9 months or so now. Store availability has never been so good. Having used replen systems in Asda this is far superior in every way. Also very user friendly for all colleagues to navigate to drive availability and stock accuracy.”_
**Lee Palfreyman, Grocery Manager**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/ecc2bf4d-2369-44b5-83b3-65a7005b5e09/morisons+logo.png)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/04431845-a8a9-4deb-9083-5a0f042ba1c7/stars.png)
_“Being well acquainted_ _with how the software works and what it can bring to stores processes, this will be and has been a game changer for availability.”_
**Ben Davies, Regional Trainer & Implementation Specialist**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64427ede63044578835d661d/ecc2bf4d-2369-44b5-83b3-65a7005b5e09/morisons+logo.png)
![Cover showcasing a supermarket aisle, promoting Focal's ROI case studies with a claim of 50x return on investment.⟨50⟩]

generated_description:
Focal Systems is at the forefront of revolutionizing the brick-and-mortar retail industry by leveraging deep learning and artificial intelligence to create a sophisticated operating system for retail, aptly named FocalOS. Founded in 2016 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2016 batch, their mission resonates deeply—"to lower the cost of living for all mankind" by automating and optimizing retail experiences.

Based in New York, Focal Systems employs a dynamic team of 170 people. Their innovative approach involves digitizing store shelves on an hourly basis, which allows retailers to see exactly how their inventory is doing at any given moment. This real-time data paves the way for smarter merchandising and streamlined supply chains, ultimately enhancing operational efficiency. The results? A remarkable average EBITDA lift of 88%, a substantial reduction in food waste, and significant productivity gains—more than doubling stocker efficiency.

This is not just about theory; Focal has deployed over 200,000 cameras in more than 1,000 stores, proving their commitment to transforming the retail landscape. Their cutting-edge solutions, such as AdaOrder for precise inventory management and FocalOS for comprehensive store management, assist retailers in making data-driven decisions that are automated rather than reactive.

Their clientele includes notable retailers like Walmart Canada and Piggly Wiggly, who attest to the effectiveness of Focal's technology in improving customer availability and overall in-store experience. Such endorsements underscore Focal Systems' influential role in not just enhancing operational metrics, but also prioritizing employee satisfaction through user-friendly interfaces that are designed with the workforce in mind.

In summary, Focal Systems is not merely a tech firm; they are the architects of a smarter retail future, where every inch of shelf space is optimized, costs are minimized, and customer satisfaction is enhanced—truly fulfilling their mission of lowering living costs through advanced AI solutions. For more insight into Focal Systems and their innovations, visit their website at [focal.systems](http://www.focal.systems).
